        public CryptoSuite(int cryptoTypeConfig,
                   ConfigOption configOption)
        init CryptoSuite
        参数:
        cryptoTypeConfig - the crypto type, e.g. ECDSA_TYPE or SM_TYPE
        configOption - the configuration of account.

      • CryptoSuite

        public CryptoSuite(int cryptoTypeConfig)
        Init the common crypto implementation according to the crypto type
        参数:
        cryptoTypeConfig - the crypto type config number
